subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In Game 1 of the N.B.A. finals, Kobe Bryant, playing with an almost disdainful vengeance, showed just how hard it will be for the Orlando Magic to win the title.
snippet: In Game 1 of the N.B.A. finals, Kobe Bryant, playing with an almost disdainful vengeance, showed just how hard it will be for the Orlando Magic to win the title.
